name: wadv-stock
description: An Electron application with Vue and TypeScript
author: example.com

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build:unpack: node scripts/version-bump.js && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build:win: node scripts/version-bump.js && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis
scripts.build:win:minor: node scripts/version-bump.js --minor && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:win:major: node scripts/version-bump.js --major && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: node scripts/version-bump.js && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:mac:minor: node scripts/version-bump.js --minor && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:mac:major: node scripts/version-bump.js --major && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: node scripts/version-bump.js && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:linux:minor: node scripts/version-bump.js --minor && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:linux:major: node scripts/version-bump.js --major && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
